articles.description: The SpaceX founder's Boring Company already operates a smaller version of the 'Vegas Loop' system underneath the Las Vegas Convention Center, which opened earlier this year to lackluster reviews.
articles.content:
Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk has won approval to build a 29-mile tunnel system underneath the Las Vegas strip.
It will allow up to 57,000 passengers to hitch rides in Teslas to and from casino… [+9582 chars]
